titleStmt.title: An oration made at the Hage, before the Prince of Orenge and the assembly of the high and mighty lords, the States Generall of the Vnited Prouinces: by the reuerend father in God, the Lord Bishop of Landaff, one of the commissioners sent by the Kings most excellent Maiesty to the Synod of Dort.
titleStmt.author: Carleton, George, 1559-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. P[urslowe] for Ralph Rounthwait, and are to sold [sic] at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Flower-deluce and Crowne,
